nodes.text: Jaresh was a planet in the Corva sector of the Outer Rim Territories. A key member of the Galactic Republic during the High Republic Era, Jaresh received a sky-island at the Republic Fair on Valo which contained a representation of its bustling markets. It was the homeworld of the Kyuzo Grimshaw, who was the cousin of Nyessa.
In the 2018 reference book Star Wars: The Rebel Files, Jaresh is misspelled as "Juresh" on page 153.
